description: The candidate has worked on the following projects: The project is titled 'Cloudphysician's Vital Extraction Challenge'. Extracted vital values from ICU monitor images using object detection and text recognition, returned as python dictionary.The project uses Computer Vision, Image Processing. The project is titled 'Multi Model Data Analysis for Annotation of Human Activities'. A predictive pipeline using accelerometer and gyroscope data from a smartwatch for annotating human activities.The project uses Python, PyTorch, Tensorflow, Sklearn. The project is titled 'Website for the Literature Society of the college'. A comprehensive website for the college's Literature Society, featuring a library management system and a reader section allowing users to view and upload content.The project uses Django Rest Framework, ReactJS. The project is titled 'LLMGuard'. LLMGuard is a user interface that integrates machine learning models trained to detect hate profanity, bias, etc. in responses generated by large language models, using Rest APIs.The project uses Pytorch, Tensorflow, Keras, Django Rest Framework, ReactJS. SKILLS:  PyTorch, Django Rest Framework, Keras, Computer Vision, Python, Sklearn, Pytorch, Image Processing, ReactJS, Tensorflow.

galkRecruitScreeningAnswers.The reason why you want to come to Japan: I want to come to Japan because Japan is one of the leading countries in AI and I am deeply interested in the field od AI. I have always been fascinated by the amazing work culture of Japan and I myself want to be a part of that work culture.
galkRecruitScreeningAnswers.The career plan you want: Currently I am in the 3rd year of my college and will graduate after almost 1.5 years. After that I plan to do a stable job preferably in the field of AI/ML and backend development.
galkRecruitScreeningAnswers.In which country do you want to work aft: For me, there is no such boundation. I can work in India, the US and even Japan.
galkRecruitScreeningAnswers.Are you likely to be adaptable to other: Although I am quite attached to my Indian roots, I am confident enough that given a sufficient amount of time in a new place, I will be able to adapt to the culture well.
galkRecruitScreeningAnswers.Instead of English-speaking countries li: Apart from the amazing work culture and the hard-working people in Japan with whom I want to work, I will get to learn a new language while I work in Japan.
galkRecruitScreeningAnswers.What are your expectations from the comp: I want to get a decent package enough to stay comfortably in a foreign country like Japan. Furthermore, I want to work on projects related to my chosen field of interest.
galkRecruitScreeningAnswers.What would you like to accomplish during: I want to contribute to cutting-edge AI/ML technologies by applying by technical skills whilst also getting to learn new skills.

galkRecruitQuestionnaireAnswers.Your strengths and characteristics: I am a hard-worker. I am good at grasping new concepts. I work good with a team.
galkRecruitQuestionnaireAnswers.Weaknesses or areas where they would lik: It takes time for me to acquire new skills. Also, I prefer not to work alone.
galkRecruitQuestionnaireAnswers.Steps they are taking or plan to take to: I try to work alone to learn to work alone.
galkRecruitQuestionnaireAnswers.Example of a challenge or setback you ha: During a tight project deadline, our team encountered unexpected technical issues that threatened the completion of the entire project.
galkRecruitQuestionnaireAnswers.Lessons learned from that experience: We quickly adopted a collaborative problem-solving approach, fostering open communication. We learned the importance of adaptability and contingency planning, ensuring smoother project execution in the future.
galkRecruitQuestionnaireAnswers.Do you have any unique background that d: My background in both engineering and graphic design sets me apart, allowing me to bridge the gap between technical and creative aspects in projects.
galkRecruitQuestionnaireAnswers.Do you have any specialty?: Specializing in data analytics, I excel in deriving meaningful insights from complex datasets, providing valuable information for strategic decision-making.
